page.title: 16CLUBS FOR CHILDREN
page.content: Lots of our children go to the Creswell Division of the Saint John's Ambulance Brigade Cadets to learn first aid. There are also packs of Cubs and Boy Scouts, Brownies and Girl Guides. For children who are good at sports there are lots of different clubs to join. Karl plays for a local football team at the weekends. Lee goes to the Judo Club at the church rooms to learn about the martial arts. Peter goes to the Speedo Swimming Club at Creswell Baths. Here the children improve their swimming strokes so that they can enter competitions. Rhonda is such a good swimmer now that she enters races all over the country. At Creswell Baths there are also swimming classes for toddlers, mothers and old age pensioners as well as children.
